output.sentences: A party at Dave's is never boring.
At one point, Dave, John, Joey and Mike decided to take a picture in the bathroom tub.
There was no way that Dennis wasn't going to get in the picture as well!
While everyone else was outside chatting, I spent most of my time in the kitchen, cleaning.
I am pretty sure we will be friends for a long time!
